scenarios.name: Create stylist business
scenarios.prompt: insert into bizes id = biz_pricing_uc17 name = CelebrityStylist slug = celebrity-stylist-uc17 status = active timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create location
scenarios.prompt: insert into locations id = loc_uc17 biz_id = biz_pricing_uc17 name = PrivateStudio slug = private-studio timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create stylist user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_celeb_uc17 email = celeb.uc17@example.com name = CelebrityStylistUser status = active

scenarios.name: Create stylist resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_celeb_stylist biz_id = biz_pricing_uc17 location_id = loc_uc17 type = host host_user_id = usr_celeb_uc17 name = CelebrityStylistResource slug = celeb-stylist-resource timezone = America/Los_Angeles capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false

scenarios.name: Create offer
scenarios.prompt: insert into offers id = ofr_uc17 biz_id = biz_pricing_uc17 name = PremiumStylingOffer slug = premium-styling-offer execution_mode = slot status = active is_published = true timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create offer version
scenarios.prompt: insert into offer_versions id = ov_uc17 biz_id = biz_pricing_uc17 offer_id = ofr_uc17 version = 1 status = published duration_mode = fixed default_duration_min = 90 min_duration_min = 90 max_duration_min = 90 base_price_minor = 20000 currency = USD

scenarios.name: Create demand signal definition
scenarios.prompt: insert into demand_signal_definitions id = dsd_waitlist_uc17 biz_id = biz_pricing_uc17 name = WaitlistDepthSignal slug = waitlist-depth kind = waitlist_depth source = system aggregation_method = max aggregation_window_min = 60 value_scale = 10000 target_type = offer_version offer_version_id = ov_uc17 is_enabled = true timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create demand signal observation
scenarios.prompt: insert into demand_signal_observations id = dso_waitlist_uc17 biz_id = biz_pricing_uc17 demand_signal_definition_id = dsd_waitlist_uc17 window_start_at = 2026-02-22T09:00:00Z window_end_at = 2026-02-22T10:00:00Z observed_at = 2026-02-22T10:00:00Z value = 8500 source = system

scenarios.name: Create surge pricing policy
scenarios.prompt: insert into demand_pricing_policies id = dpp_surge_uc17 biz_id = biz_pricing_uc17 name = SurgePricing slug = surge-pricing status = active target_type = offer_version offer_version_id = ov_uc17 scoring_mode = weighted_sum score_floor = 0 score_ceiling = 10000 default_adjustment_type = percentage default_apply_as = surcharge default_adjustment_value = 0 min_adjustment_minor = 0 max_adjustment_minor = 40000 min_final_unit_price_minor = 15000 max_final_unit_price_minor = 40000 cooldown_min = 15 priority = 10 is_enabled = true

scenarios.name: Attach demand signal to policy
scenarios.prompt: insert into demand_pricing_policy_signals id = dpps_uc17 biz_id = biz_pricing_uc17 demand_pricing_policy_id = dpp_surge_uc17 demand_signal_definition_id = dsd_waitlist_uc17 weight_bps = 10000 is_required = true freshness_max_min = 180 offset_value = 0 multiplier_bps = 10000 sort_order = 1

scenarios.name: Create high-demand tier
scenarios.prompt: insert into demand_pricing_policy_tiers id = dppt_high_uc17 biz_id = biz_pricing_uc17 demand_pricing_policy_id = dpp_surge_uc17 name = HighDemandTier min_score = 7000 max_score = 10000 adjustment_type = percentage apply_as = surcharge adjustment_value = 2500 sort_order = 1 is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create VIP membership plan
scenarios.prompt: insert into membership_plans id = mp_vip_uc17 biz_id = biz_pricing_uc17 name = VIPEarlyAccess slug = vip-early-access status = active billing_interval_count = 1 billing_interval_unit = month price_minor = 5000 currency = USD entitlement_type = pass entitlement_quantity_per_cycle = 1 allow_rollover = false allow_transfers = false

scenarios.name: Create priority queue
scenarios.prompt: insert into queues id = q_vip_uc17 biz_id = biz_pricing_uc17 location_id = loc_uc17 name = VIPPriorityQueue slug = vip-priority-queue strategy = priority status = active is_self_join_enabled = true
